Articles.Content:
Near Mun,

First Attempt to land on it since my update to 1.1.3, went on an EVA around spacecraft for about 10 seconds then came back to spacecraft to board it.

Boarding was successful until I realized that Valentina was still on the outside of the spacecraft, so I tried to switch focus to her many times but too no success. Valentina is in the command module but her model is still "outside" and any attempt to EVA with the Valentina  inside the command module give the warning of hatch obstructed. Brushing off the "Outside" Valentina works and can still EVA with inside Valentina, when boarded again this cycle happens again.

Valentina is being duplicated for ever. No affect to gameplay except for lots of unselectable kebals on EVAs around the ship

NOTE : Kerbal on outside still counts as a Kerbal because you cant warp when its on the ladder of Command Module

Sorry no pic to this (Cant figure out how to attach pic)

Edited October 27, 2016 by ike333

Your problem has been seen before in multiple contexts. It is usually accompanied by a type of error in your logfiles called an "exception".

Posting your output_log.txt file (or Player.log) would be very helpful.

Edited October 28, 2016 by bewing
Sorry but I cant figure out how to attach a file to this post, I found the file it just don't know how to post it

If you have any type of cloud storage, Dropbox, OneDrive, etc. You can upload it there and get a sharing link, which you can just paste into a reply here.

Edited October 29, 2016 by tg626

On 27.10.2016 at 11:33 PM, ike333 said:

 

Sorry no pic to this (Cant figure out how to attach pic)

To attach a pic:

- Go to imgur.com

- Drag and drop a picture file onto the website OR click new post in the uppper left part of the page, then click Browse and find the file you want

- You'll get into the new album's page, you can drag and drop more files if you want more photos in it.

- If you want the photo to get directly into the forum, without giving the link to the album: Hover over a specific photo in the album and press copy, paste it into any usable notepad-like thing (not directly into the forum post!) and change the link like from imgur.com/EXAMPLE to i.imgur.com/EXAMPLE.png (if you uploaded a .jpg file, it should be .jpg instead of .png, but KSP screenshots are in .png format), copy your newly edited link, and paste it into the post.

this is the link for the picture

http://imgur.com/a/PaM1D

also the output log

https://1drv.ms/t/s!AvV-uCjssgMdiRUlANKo9mfqvYBj

Edited November 1, 2016 by ike333

Been there, done that, worked around it:

Supposedly this was fixed in 1.2, but I haven't seriously tried to reproduce the problem. I can't reproduce the problem anymore.

Back in 1.1.3, this seems to be caused by having a not-yet-deployed fairing or engine shroud, deploying said fairing or shroud, then EVAing a kerbal. That kerbal gets duplicated with an invalid part type when they re-board the affected craft. The workaround of saving / loading after deploying the fairing or shroud but before EVAing any kerbals seems to work.

--

Edited November 2, 2016 by Gordon Fecyk
Verified I can't reproduce problem in 1.2
